title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.15 - Meeting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.15 - Meeting

State Regulations

The student assembly shall meet at least once each
semester with the dates and places to be determined by the student assembly. The annual business meeting must be held during the month of April. Special
meetings may be called by the executive committee, by the request of one
quarter of the student assembly representatives, one quarter of the member
institutions, or the chancellor; the date and place of a special meeting shall
be determined by the executive committee and the meeting must be held no later
than 30 days following the request to hold such a meeting. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
341.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
